heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the history, benefits, and sacred process of working with Ayahuasca.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the experienced spiritual guides who will accompany you on your journey.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay connected, receive updates on our next ceremonies, and be part of a community dedicated to healing and spiritual growth.
footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
editCeremonyDescription: Make changes to your ceremony here. Click save when you're done.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve your spot with a 20% deposit.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide a media URL or upload a file.
guidesPageSubtitle: Meet the experienced guides who will accompany you with wisdom and compassion on your path of transformation.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This will permanently remove the guide from the list.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral psychoactive brew from the Amazon, traditionally used for spiritual and healing purposes. It is prepared by combining the Banisteriopsis caapi vine and the leaves of the Psychotria viridis shrub, which together activate its visionary properties. It is a tool for deep introspection, emotional release, and spiritual connection.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The experience with Ayahuasca, often called a 'mareación,' is a profound journey into the subconscious. It can bring forth repressed memories, reveal unconscious patterns, and offer deep insights into one's life purpose. The process is guided by sacred songs (icaros) that help direct and modulate the energy of the ceremony, facilitating healing and transformation.
spiritualMasterTitle: A Spiritual Master, Not a Drug
spiritualMasterDescription: It is crucial to approach Ayahuasca with respect and a clear intention. It is not a recreational substance but a master plant that teaches, heals, and guides. The experience can be challenging, as it confronts us with our deepest shadows, but it is through this process that true liberation and understanding are found.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: It helps release limiting beliefs and brings clarity to your life path.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: It facilitates the healing of past traumas and the release of repressed emotions.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: It expands consciousness and fosters a deep connection with your inner self and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: Held in a safe and supportive group container, where the collective energy enhances the individual healing process. It is an opportunity to share and learn in community.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, ideal for those who wish to work on specific profound themes or prefer a more contained environment for their process.
loginSubtext: Sign in to continue your journey.
loginSuccessDescription: Welcome back! You are now logged in.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully logged in with your Google account.
registerSubtext: Join our community to begin your transformation.
registerSuccessDescription: A verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: Explore upcoming, past, and special events. Find the perfect experience for your journey.
authRequiredDescription: You must be logged in to perform this action.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you provide a phone number.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeUpdateReload: The page will now reload to apply the changes.
themeCustomizationDescription: Modify the application's color palette. The changes will be applied live.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: Please re-login with your new email.
enterPasswordToConfirm: Please enter your current password to confirm.
chatbotWelcome: Greetings, seeker of light. I am here to guide you on your path of healing and self-discovery. How may I assist your spirit today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
preparationProcessDescription: The journey begins before the ceremony. A process of physical and mental purification to open the heart.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A sacred space where, guided by icaros, you connect with the wisdom of the master plant.
experienceProcessDescription: A deep introspection that can reveal, heal, and transform. Each journey is unique and personal.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we support you in weaving the teachings received into your daily life.
dietTitle: The Dieta: Purifying Body and Spirit
dietSubtitle: For one week before the ceremony, we recommend a clean diet to prepare your body.
mentalPrepSubtitle: The intention you bring is the seed of your transformation.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and open yourself to receiving.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you wish to heal or understand. What questions do you bring to the medicine?
reflectionDescription: Write about your emotions, fears, and hopes. It is a way to clarify your process.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca works deeply on an emotional level, helping to release old wounds and stagnant energies. It is an opportunity to forgive, forgive yourself, and reconnect with love. Trust the process and allow the medicine to show you what you need to see.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure a comfortable and profound experience.
essentialsList: Change of clothes for the next day
An open heart and a humble spirit
A sacred object for the altar (optional)
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
mustBeLoggedInToViewCeremonies: You must be logged in to view the ceremonies.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer the following questions honestly. This information is confidential and will only be used by our team to ensure a safe and proper experience for you.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for filling out the form. You can review your answers here or proceed to the preparation guide.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (e.g., heart, liver, kidney problems, high blood pressure)?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDetails: Please provide details about your medical conditions.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any prescription medication, supplements, or regular medication?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list all medications and supplements you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions (e.g., schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: Please provide details about your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with ayahuasca or other psychedelic plants?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: Please briefly describe your previous experiences.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: Describe what you hope to heal, understand, or explore...
errorRequiredDetails: Please provide details if you answered yes.
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your information has been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your answers. Please try again.
dialogSuccessDescription: Your information is complete. The next step is to prepare yourself for the journey. Our guide contains everything you need to know.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: This is the information provided by the user.
noAnswersSubmitted: This user has not yet submitted their questionnaire answers.

backupSubtitle: Manage your application's data by creating backups and restoring them.
exportDataDescription: Download all important data (ceremonies, users, content) as a single JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore data from a JSON file. This will overwrite existing data.
importSuccessDescription: The application data has been restored.
importWarningDescription: This action is irreversible. Importing will overwrite all current data in the database. A backup of the current state will be created automatically before importing.
rollbackCardDescription: A backup was created before the last import. You can restore it if something went wrong.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been restored to the state before the last import.
rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to restore the data to the state before the last import? This will overwrite the current data.
analyticsDescription: Track user interaction with different sections of the site.
countersResetSuccess: Counters have been reset to zero.
resetCountersConfirmDescription: This will reset the view and click counters for this ceremony to zero. This action cannot be undone.
resetAnalyticsConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all click tracking data. Are you sure you want to start over?

preparationCtaDescription: The experience begins long before the ceremony. Learn how to prepare your body, mind, and spirit.
